allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Architect portfolio with Blue Ocean Minimalist design

- Header: sticky minimal navigation with menu overlay
- Hero: animated statement with background image and scroll indicator
- ProjectGallery: masonry grid with hover data cards showing project intelligence
- ProjectViewer: full-screen swipeable gallery with 20 images per project
- Swiss typography using Inter font
- Framer Motion animations throughout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
